DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , single-arm , unblinded , case observation study evaluate commercially release 'Conformité Européenne ' ( CE ) -mark co-registration software system along-side commercially- release CE-mark coronary physiology X-ray system routine clinical workflow . The purpose study collect Professional user feedback regard clinical utility SyncVision 4.X system .
DOC.brief_title: User Evaluation Study SyncVision System With Software v4.X
DOC.detailed_description: The PREPARE II study enroll maximum 200 patient 5 site . No follow-up performed . The PREPARE II study collect data diagnostic angiogram percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) procedure , perform per standard hospital care .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible indicated cardiac catheterization pressurewire assessment coronary artery per standard hospital practice Males age 18 year postmenopausal female Patient able give write informed consent prior use his/her study data evaluation documentation Patient unable give write informed consent prior use his/her study data evaluation documentation
